name: DFF NT: Kuja Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Allows you to use Kuja and equip him with the following items.
- Angel of Death I (Appearance)
- Angel of Death II (Appearance)
- Angel of Death III (Appearance)
- Brumal Cores (Weapon)
- Brilliant Cores (Weapon)
- Scintillant Cores (Weapon)
- Special Chat Messages

*You must first download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.
* This content is included in DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Deluxe Edition and Standard Edition, available to purchase seperately

fullgame.name: DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Prozessor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 8 GB RAM
  • Grafik: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Netzwerk: Breitband-Internetverbindung
  • Speicherplatz: 35 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Prozessor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 8 GB RAM
  • Grafik: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Netzwerk: Breitband-Internetverbindung
  • Speicherplatz: 35 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
